showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // “Seeing that train got Grandpa more excited
than I've seen him for some time.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // “With Meteor coming,
I guess it doesn't matter…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // “As long as we stay here,
Grandpa won't be able
to forget about trains.”{PAUSE}“Maybe we should start fresh,
and move to
{CYAN}Southern Isle of Mideel{WHITE}?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // “Grandpa used to be
a Coal Train engineer.”{PAUSE}“He still can't kick
his old habits from then.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // “What the?
Watch out for the train!”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // “The next train's coming in soon.”
